languages.text: "Темный город — бастион друкари, величайший из наших оплотов. Здесь обретаются кабалы, ведьминские культы и ордена инкубов, над их головами парят стаи плетей, а под ногами таятся мириады отбросов и ужасов, включая ковены гемункулов. О ком ты хочешь знать?"

traits.locale_text: "Темный город — бастион друкари, величайший из наших оплотов. Здесь обретаются кабалы, ведьминские культы и ордена инкубов, над их головами парят стаи плетей, а под ногами таятся мириады отбросов и ужасов, включая ковены гемункулов. О ком ты хочешь знать?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"
languages.original_text: "Темный город — бастион друкари, величайший из наших оплотов. Здесь обретаются кабалы, ведьминские культы и ордена инкубов, над их головами парят стаи плетей, а под ногами таятся мириады отбросов и ужасов, включая ковены гемункулов. О ком ты хочешь знать?"

traits.locale_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, the Wych Cults, and the Incubi Orders inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and myriad misfits and horrors, including the Haemonculi Covens, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «La Ciudad Siniestra es el bastión de los Drukhari, nuestra más sublime fortaleza. Las Kábalas, los Cultos de Brujas y los Íncubos viven allí, con enjambres de Azotes sobrevolando a la gente y miles de aberraciones y horrores, incluyendo los Cónclaves de Hemónculos, por debajo. ¿Cuál te interesa conocer más a fondo?».
languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

traits.locale_text: «La Ciudad Siniestra es el bastión de los Drukhari, nuestra más sublime fortaleza. Las Kábalas, los Cultos de Brujas y los Íncubos viven allí, con enjambres de Azotes sobrevolando a la gente y miles de aberraciones y horrores, incluyendo los Cónclaves de Hemónculos, por debajo. ¿Cuál te interesa conocer más a fondo?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “黑暗之城是黑暗灵族的堡垒，也是我们之中最宏伟的据点。这里是无数阴谋团、巫灵教派与梦魇的居所，天空中飞舞着成群结队的天灾，脚下是无穷无尽的怪物与恐怖，血伶人密会也在其中。你想了解哪些事情？”
languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

traits.locale_text: “黑暗之城是黑暗灵族的堡垒，也是我们之中最宏伟的据点。这里是无数阴谋团、巫灵教派与梦魇的居所，天空中飞舞着成群结队的天灾，脚下是无穷无尽的怪物与恐怖，血伶人密会也在其中。你想了解哪些事情？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「仄暗き都はデュカーリの掩蔽壕で、どの要塞よりも壮大なんだ。陰謀団、魔女団、インキュバスが住んでいて、頭上にはスカージの群れが飛び交い、足元にはハモンキュラスの盟約団を含む無数のはみ出し者や恐怖がうごめいている。どれについて知りたいのだ？」
languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

traits.locale_text: 「仄暗き都はデュカーリの掩蔽壕で、どの要塞よりも壮大なんだ。陰謀団、魔女団、インキュバスが住んでいて、頭上にはスカージの群れが飛び交い、足元にはハモンキュラスの盟約団を含む無数のはみ出し者や恐怖がうごめいている。どれについて知りたいのだ？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « La Cité Crépusculaire est le bastion des Drukharis, la plus splendide de nos places fortes. Les Kabales, les Cultes Cérastes et les Incubes vivent à la surface, alors que des essaims de Fléaux sillonnent ses cieux et qu'une myriade de parias et autres abominations, dont les coteries d'hémoncules, se terrent dans ses profondeurs. Lesquels de ses habitants vous intéressent ? »
languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

traits.locale_text: « La Cité Crépusculaire est le bastion des Drukharis, la plus splendide de nos places fortes. Les Kabales, les Cultes Cérastes et les Incubes vivent à la surface, alors que des essaims de Fléaux sillonnent ses cieux et qu'une myriade de parias et autres abominations, dont les coteries d'hémoncules, se terrent dans ses profondeurs. Lesquels de ses habitants vous intéressent ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die Dunkle Stadt ist die Bastion der Drukhari, die prächtigste all unserer Hochburgen. Die Kabale, Hekatarii-Kulte und Incubi bewohnen die Stadt. Schwärme von Harpyien fliegen über den Köpfen der Bewohner, und eine Unzahl von Grauen und Schrecken wuseln am Boden, darunter die Zirkel der Haemonculi. Über wen wollt Ihr etwas wissen?"
languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Dunkle Stadt ist die Bastion der Drukhari, die prächtigste all unserer Hochburgen. Die Kabale, Hekatarii-Kulte und Incubi bewohnen die Stadt. Schwärme von Harpyien fliegen über den Köpfen der Bewohner, und eine Unzahl von Grauen und Schrecken wuseln am Boden, darunter die Zirkel der Haemonculi. Über wen wollt Ihr etwas wissen?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

languages.text: "Drukharilerin yurdu Kara Şehir, kalelerimiz içinde en görkemlisidir. Kaballar, Viç Tarikatları ve İnkubuslar yaşar. Semalarında türlü musibetler, derinliklerinde de Haimonkulus Meclisleri gibi binbir çeşit uğursuz, dehşetengiz mahluk dolaşır. Hangi kısımdan bahsedeyim?"
languages.original_text: "The Dark City is the bastion of the Drukhari, the most magnificent of all our strongholds. The Kabals, Wych Cults, and the Incubi inhabit the place, with swarms of Scourges flying overhead, and a myriad of misfits and horrors, including the Covens of the Haemonculi, wallowing underfoot. Which do you want to know about?"

traits.locale_text: "Drukharilerin yurdu Kara Şehir, kalelerimiz içinde en görkemlisidir. Kaballar, Viç Tarikatları ve Karabasanlar yaşar. Semalarında türlü musibetler, derinliklerinde de Haimonkulus Meclisleri gibi binbir çeşit uğursuz, dehşetengiz mahluk dolaşır. Hangi kısımdan bahsedeyim?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
